text: Hi Talia, I already fixed that template, but you can try creating a custom module on the old DM containing an Image field with a sample image and add it to a template, then switch to the new DM and upgrade that module. Now edit its default content in the template and see the preview/or create a page. I think this happens only when the custom module includes an Image field. I’ve made a video to demonstrate this problem (I’ll direct message the link shortly)
Thanks for the link! I think I know what the problem is, and yes that should be limited to just image fields. I'll have my team look into it

posting this here as there appears to be a really annoying bug in DM2 making it difficult to edit custom modules.

I killed all my extensions and still see this issue(so it is not caused by an extension)

I am having and issue where a firld that I am adding to a repeating field does not show the content. We have tried multiple firld types but nothing works. Existing fields are working but any new ones added are not working.

Very very simple request - can you add a class to flex columns in the drag n drop builder?
<https://spin.d.pr/CehE9F+>

We’d like to do some things with that in the extension to make them visually stand out more.
A file, which can't be shown because your team is past the free storage limit, was commented on.
